actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to suspend reviews of antidumping and countervailing duty orders and other determinations under title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding any product of a country during the period when an embargo is in effect with respect to that product.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to prohibit the administering authority or the International Trade Commission from reviewing antidumping and countervailing duty orders covering any product of a country during the period when an embargo is in effect with respect to such product.

titles.title: A bill to suspend reviews of antidumping and countervailing duty orders and other determinations under title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding any product of a country during the period when an embargo is in effect with respect to that product.
